The man is wearing a fedora hat, which is a broad-brimmed, soft felt hat with a dent in the crown. It is typically creased lengthwise down the crown and "pinched" near the front on both sides.
The man is wearing a fedora, a type of hat with a soft brim and indented crown. It is typically made of felt or straw and is often associated with the 1920s and 1930s.
